name: がんばれゴエモン〜ゆき姫救出絵巻〜
summary: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja (がんばれゴエモン〜ゆき姫救出絵巻〜 Ganbare Goemon: Yukihime Kyūshutsu Emaki) is an action-adventure game by Konami, and was released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1991. It was also ported to the Game Boy Advance along with Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shōgun Magginesu only in Japan.
info:
• 中文名: 大盗五右卫门 雪姬救出绘卷

  • 别名: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja

  • 游戏类型: Action-adventure
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: 1991年7月19日
